deprecated_vacuum_base_class.title: The {platform} custom integration is using deprecated vacuum feature
deprecated_vacuum_base_class.description:
The custom integration `{platform}` is extending the deprecated base class `VacuumEntity` instead of `StateVacuumEntity`.

Please report it to the author of the `{platform}` custom integration.

Once an updated version of `{platform}` is available, install it and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.

turn_off.name: Turn off
turn_off.description: Stops the current cleaning task and return to home.

start_pause.name: Start/pause
start_pause.description: Starts, pauses, or resumes the cleaning task.

start.name: Start
start.description: Starts or resumes the cleaning task.

return_to_base.name: Return to base
return_to_base.description: Tells the vacuum cleaner to return to its dock.

clean_spot.name: Clean spot
clean_spot.description: Tells the vacuum cleaner to do a spot clean-up.

send_command.name: Send command
send_command.description: Sends a raw command to the vacuum cleaner.

set_fan_speed.name: Set fan speed
set_fan_speed.description: Sets the fan speed of the vacuum cleaner.

fan_speed.name: Fan speed
fan_speed.description: Platform dependent vacuum cleaner fan speed, with speed steps, like 'medium' or by percentage, between 0 and 100.
